text: The 2013 Kazakhstan Hockey Cup was the 11th edition of the Kazakhstan Hockey Cup, the national ice hockey cup competition in Kazakhstan. Tent teams participated and Arlan Kokshetau won its 2nd cup. ==First round== ===Group A=== {| class="wikitable" width="50%" ! width="30%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | GP ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | W ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | OTW ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | OTL ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | L ! width="7.5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | GF:GA ! width="7.5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | Pts |- align="center" bgcolor="#CCFFCC" | align="left" | Yertis Pavlodar | 4 || 4 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 18:4 || 12 |- align="center" bgcolor="#CCFFCC" | align="left" | Arystan Temirtau | 4 || 3 || 0 || 0 || 1 || 21:8 || 9 |- align="center" | align="left" | Gornyak Rudny | 4 || 1 || 1 || 0 || 2 || 8:13 || 5 |- align="center" | align="left" | HC Astana | 4 || 1 || 0 || 1 || 2 || 8:18 || 4 |- align="center" | align="left" | Torpedo Oskemen | 4 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 4 || 10:22 || 0 |} ===Group B=== {| class="wikitable" width="50%" ! width="30%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | GP ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | W ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | OTW ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | OTL ! width="5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | L ! width="7.5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | GF:GA ! width="7.5%" bgcolor="#e0e0e0" | Pts |- align="center" bgcolor="#CCFFCC" | align="left" | Arlan Kokshetau | 4 || 4 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 21:6 || 12 |- align="center" bgcolor="#CCFFCC" | align="left" | HC Almaty | 4 || 1 || 1 || 1 || 1 || 12:11 || 6 |- align="center" | align="left" | Berkut Karagandy | 4 || 1 || 1 || 0 || 2 || 6:12 || 5 |- align="center" | align="left" | Beibarys Atyrau | 4 || 1 || 0 || 1 || 2 || 8:7 || 4 |- align="center" | align="left" | Nomad Astana | 4 || 1 || 0 || 0 || 3 || 8:19 || 3 |} ==Final round== *Match for 3rd place: *Arystan Temirtau - HC Almaty 5-2 *Final: *Yertis Pavlodar - Arlan Kokshetau 2-3 (OT) ==References== Category:2013–14 in Kazakhstani ice hockey Category:Kazakhstan Hockey Cup
